annonsrubrik: HR Specialist Global Mobility (parental leave cover)
annonstext:
CEVT is an innovation and development company at the forefront of mobility. Modular development, ground-breaking virtual engineering, software development and continuous innovation enable us to deliver world-class technology.
Today we deliver to different automotive brands in the Geely family such as Geely Auto, Volvo Cars, and Lynk & Co and are based at Lindholmen in Gothenburg.

We are looking for an HR specialist to join our team to work with general Global Mobility tasks. This is a temporary opportunity due to parental leave.

This is what you will do most of the time:
You will be responsible for administering the lifecycle of assignments for employees being assigned to CEVT, other Geely entities within Sweden and/or abroad. Tasks will include coordinating immigration, payroll, pension, tax, and insurances (with support from suppliers). You will also keep in regular contact with our HR colleagues at Geely’s headquarter based in Hangzhou, China, to provide HR support to their assignees based in Sweden.
The role will also include supporting our recruiters, HRBPs and managers with recruiting international local hires. Tasks will include coordinating pre-visits, onboarding and immigration for candidates / new hires together with suppliers.
You may also support with business travel queries such as invitation letter requests, visas and more.

We think that you are:

- Group oriented, collaborative and a team player
- Not afraid of taking on new challenges
- Comfortable being the ’go to person’ for assignees and others
- Service minded and professional
- Attentive to detail
- Experienced within HR/Administration
- Fully proficient in English both written and verbally. Chinese is a plus!
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal

For more information please contact:
FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Head of HR Excellence,  TELEPHONENO for questions regarding the position

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Senior Recruiter,  TELEPHONENO ,  EMAIL  for questions regarding the recruitment process

Last application date: 2021-03-31

Apply today, we will perform ongoing selection during the application period.
We look forward to hearing from you.

Please note that due to GDPR regulations we can only accept applications and CV's sent through the recruitment system, not via email or other channels.

Working at CEVT

We are engineers, developers and innovators from around the world. Joined together by entrepreneurship, our unique blend of Chinese and Scandinavian culture and a belief in a smarter more sustainable future.

- Supportive and creative work environment

- 30 days of vacation and additional 8 days paid ATK- days annually
- Great office location at Lindholmen
